attributes.action: Support Resident led regeneration schemes in the 35 Nieghbourhood Management Pathfinder Programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Within the Comprehensive Spending Review, continue to support the central Government funding of resident led regeneration schemes, specifically the 35 successful Neighbourhood Management Pathfinder programmes. Futher, to protect resident ownership of the programme through the withdrawal from inclusion in the Local Area Agreement process and retention of local decision and budgeting of the programme.
